h2_title: Where to use Rice Cocoons in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Rice Cocoons can be used with the rice baskets in the Zodiac Realm next to Chen Loong in The New West. These unlock after you have defeated him and given him the Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet. Upon visiting the Zodiac Realm, you can then hand him the Proto-Amourworm, which is located in The Webbed Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rice_Cocoons.md', within the main section titled 'Rice Cocoons', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use Rice Cocoons in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Rice Cocoons can be used with the rice baskets in the Zodiac Realm next to Chen Loong in The New West. These unlock after you have defeated him and given him the Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet. Upon visiting the Zodiac Realm, you can then hand him the Proto-Amourworm, which is located in The Webbed Hollow.
